meanings.sent1: The altitudinal measurement of the mountain was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The altitudinal change affected the weather patterns in the region.
meanings.sent3: The altitudinal challenge of climbing the steep hill made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her altitudinal perspective on life gave her a unique outlook.
meanings.sent5: The altitudinal view from the top of the tower was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the altitude of something.
meanings.sent1: The altitudinal position of the airplane was carefully monitored.
meanings.sent2: The altitudinal level of the clouds indicated an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The altitudinal measurement of the treehouse surprised the kids.
meanings.sent4: His altitudinal understanding of the situation helped him make the right decision.
meanings.sent5: The altitudinal height of the skyscraper was astonishing.

meanings.sent1: The altitudinal changes in temperature were significant.
meanings.sent2: The altitudinal variations affected the flight path of the birds.
meanings.sent3: The altitudinal challenge of the race made it more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her altitudinal approach to problem-solving was effective.
meanings.sent5: The altitudinal difference between the two cities was noticeable.
